place.name: LLANDDEWI FACH
place.gazetteerText: LLANDEWYFACH, a parish in the district of Hav and county of Radnor; on the river Bachwy, an affluent of the Wye, 5¼ miles NW of Hay r. station. Posttown, Hay, under Hereford. Acres, 2,297. Real property, £1,185. Pop., 115. Houses, 22. The living is a vicarage, annexed to the vicarage of Llowes, in the diocese of St. David's. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
